languages.text: Спустя годы Соломон Антар стал маршалом и ужесточил требования к арбитрам: теперь от них ожидалась полная безупречность мысли и дела, а также поистине религиозное самоотречение. Ведомые своим великим маршалом, Арбитес стали истинными носителями божественного света Императора, однако без притока новобранцев с другой стороны Зева они были обречены на вымирание. После смерти Соломона арбитры с честью исполняли долг, пока не ушли один за другим, оставив Простор Коронус без своего неусыпного надзора.

Years later, Solomorne Anthar became Marshal and quickly tightened the requirements for all Arbitrators. They were now expected to be beyond any reproach whatsoever in both thought or deed, as well as ascetic to a religious degree. Under their great Marshal's leadership, the Arbites became the true bearers of the Emperor's divine light; however, the lack of new recruits from across the Maw would also doom them to extinction. After Solomorne's death, the Arbitrators continued to do their duty honourably, until they, too, passed away one by one, leaving the Koronus Expanse without their ever-vigilant oversight.
languages.original_text: Спустя годы Соломон Антар стал маршалом и ужесточил требования к арбитрам: теперь от них ожидалась полная безупречность мысли и дела, а также поистине религиозное самоотречение. Ведомые своим великим маршалом, Арбитес стали истинными носителями божественного света Императора, однако без притока новобранцев с другой стороны Зева они были обречены на вымирание. После смерти Соломона арбитры с честью исполняли долг, пока не ушли один за другим, оставив Простор Коронус без своего неусыпного надзора.

traits.locale_text: Years later, Solomorne Anthar became marshal and toughened requirements for Arbitrators. They were now expected to be beyond any reproach whatsoever in thought or deed, as well as ascetic to a religious degree. Under their great marshal's leadership, the Arbites became the true bearers of the Emperor's divine light; however, the lack of new recruits from across the Maw would doom them to extinction. After Solomorne's death, the Arbitrators did their duty honourably until they, too, passed away one by one, leaving the Koronus Expanse without their ever-vigilant oversight.

languages.text: Jahre später wurde Solomorne Anthar Marschall und verschärfte schon bald die Anforderungen für alle Arbitratoren. Von ihnen wurde nun erwartet, dass sie in Gedanken und Tat ohne jeden Tadel waren und in fast religiösem Ausmaß asketisch lebten. Unter der Führung ihres großen Marschalls wurden die Arbites zu den wahren Trägern des göttlichen Lichts des Imperators, doch der Mangel an neuen Rekruten aus dem Schlund bedeutete letztlich auch ihr Aussterben. Nach Solomornes Tod erfüllten die Arbitratoren weiterhin ehrenhaft ihre Pflicht, bis auch sie einer nach dem anderen verstarben und die Koronus-Ausdehnung ohne ihren stets wachsame Aufsicht zurückließen.
languages.original_text: Years later, Solomorne Anthar became Marshal and quickly tightened the requirements for all Arbitrators. They were now expected to be beyond any reproach whatsoever in both thought or deed, as well as ascetic to a religious degree. Under their great Marshal's leadership, the Arbites became the true bearers of the Emperor's divine light; however, the lack of new recruits from across the Maw would also doom them to extinction. After Solomorne's death, the Arbitrators continued to do their duty honourably, until they, too, passed away one by one, leaving the Koronus Expanse without their ever-vigilant oversight.

traits.locale_text: Jahre später wurde Solomorne Anthar Marschall und verschärfte schon bald die Anforderungen für alle Arbitratoren. Von ihnen wurde nun erwartet, dass sie in Gedanken und Tat ohne jeden Tadel waren und in fast religiösem Ausmaß asketisch lebten. Unter der Führung ihres großen Marschalls wurden die Arbites zu den wahren Trägern des göttlichen Lichts des Imperators, doch der Mangel an neuen Rekruten aus dem Schlund bedeutete letztlich auch ihr Aussterben. Nach Solomornes Tod erfüllten die Arbitratoren weiterhin ehrenhaft ihre Pflicht, bis auch sie einer nach dem anderen verstarben und die Koronus-Ausdehnung ohne ihren stets wachsame Aufsicht zurückließen.

languages.text: Bien des années plus tard, Solomorne Anthar devint maréchal et s'attela très vite à renforcer les exigences imposées aux arbitrators. Désormais, on attendait d'eux qu'ils soient irréprochables, tant en actes qu'en pensées, et qu'ils fassent preuve d'un ascétisme quasiment religieux. Sous l'égide du grand maréchal, les membres de l'Arbites devinrent de véritables porteurs de la lumière divine de l'Empereur. Seul point noir au tableau : le manque de nouvelles recrues venant de l'autre côté de La Gueule les condamnait à l'extinction. Après la mort de Solomorne, les arbitrators continuèrent à s'acquitter honorablement de leur mission, et ce, jusqu'à ce qu'ils disparaissent à leur tour l'un après l'autre, abandonnant les Étendues de Koronus à leur sort.
languages.original_text: Years later, Solomorne Anthar became Marshal and quickly tightened the requirements for all Arbitrators. They were now expected to be beyond any reproach whatsoever in both thought or deed, as well as ascetic to a religious degree. Under their great Marshal's leadership, the Arbites became the true bearers of the Emperor's divine light; however, the lack of new recruits from across the Maw would also doom them to extinction. After Solomorne's death, the Arbitrators continued to do their duty honourably, until they, too, passed away one by one, leaving the Koronus Expanse without their ever-vigilant oversight.

traits.locale_text: Bien des années plus tard, Solomorne Anthar devint maréchal et s'attela très vite à renforcer les exigences imposées aux arbitrators. Désormais, on attendait d'eux qu'ils soient irréprochables, tant en actes qu'en pensées, et qu'ils fassent preuve d'un ascétisme quasiment religieux. Sous l'égide du grand maréchal, les membres de l'Arbites devinrent de véritables porteurs de la lumière divine de l'Empereur. Seul point noir au tableau : le manque de nouvelles recrues venant de l'autre côté de La Gueule les condamnait à l'extinction. Après la mort de Solomorne, les arbitrators continuèrent à s'acquitter honorablement de leur mission, et ce, jusqu'à ce qu'ils disparaissent à leur tour l'un après l'autre, abandonnant les Étendues de Koronus à leur sort.

languages.text: 几年后，索罗蒙·安萨成为了法务部的新任元帅，以极其严格的标准约束全体法务官。法务部全体成员无论是思想还是行为都无可指摘，他们遵循禁欲主义的生活方式，几乎可以与神职人员相媲美。在伟大元帅的引导下，这些法务官成为了帝皇之光真正的传递者。然而，由于巨口无法通行，法务部无法吸纳新成员，也面临着后继无人的困境。索罗蒙死后，其余法务官依然光荣地履行着各自的职责。他们一个接一个地离世，而科罗努斯扩区也渐渐失去了他们片刻不曾松懈的守护。
languages.original_text: Years later, Solomorne Anthar became Marshal and quickly tightened the requirements for all Arbitrators. They were now expected to be beyond any reproach whatsoever in both thought or deed, as well as ascetic to a religious degree. Under their great Marshal's leadership, the Arbites became the true bearers of the Emperor's divine light; however, the lack of new recruits from across the Maw would also doom them to extinction. After Solomorne's death, the Arbitrators continued to do their duty honourably, until they, too, passed away one by one, leaving the Koronus Expanse without their ever-vigilant oversight.

traits.locale_text: 几年后，索罗蒙·安萨成为了法务部的新任元帅，以极其严格的标准约束全体法务官。法务部全体成员无论是思想还是行为都无可指摘，他们遵循禁欲主义的生活方式，几乎可以与神职人员相媲美。在伟大元帅的引导下，这些法务官成为了帝皇之光真正的传递者。然而，由于巨口无法通行，法务部无法吸纳新成员，也面临着后继无人的困境。索罗蒙死后，其余法务官依然光荣地履行着各自的职责。他们一个接一个地离世，而科罗努斯扩区也渐渐失去了他们片刻不曾松懈的守护。

languages.text: Años después, Solomorne Anthar se convirtió en Mariscal y se apresuró a aumentar las exigencias para todos los Arbitrator. Ahora se esperaba que fueran intachables tanto de acto como de pensamiento, además de religiosamente ascetas. Bajo el liderazgo de su gran Mariscal, los miembros del Arbites se convirtieron en auténticos portadores de la luz divina del Emperador, aunque la ausencia de nuevos reclutas del otro lado de las Fauces los condenó a la extinción. Tras la muerte de Solomorne, los Arbitrator continuaron con su deber con honor, hasta que, con el tiempo, ellos también fallecieron y la Extensión de Koronus se encontró sin su atenta supervisión.
languages.original_text: Years later, Solomorne Anthar became Marshal and quickly tightened the requirements for all Arbitrators. They were now expected to be beyond any reproach whatsoever in both thought or deed, as well as ascetic to a religious degree. Under their great Marshal's leadership, the Arbites became the true bearers of the Emperor's divine light; however, the lack of new recruits from across the Maw would also doom them to extinction. After Solomorne's death, the Arbitrators continued to do their duty honourably, until they, too, passed away one by one, leaving the Koronus Expanse without their ever-vigilant oversight.

traits.locale_text: Años después, Solomorne Anthar se convirtió en Mariscal y se apresuró a aumentar las exigencias para todos los Arbitrator. Ahora se esperaba que fueran intachables tanto de acto como de pensamiento, además de religiosamente ascetas. Bajo el liderazgo de su gran Mariscal, los miembros del Arbites se convirtieron en auténticos portadores de la luz divina del Emperador, aunque la ausencia de nuevos reclutas del otro lado de las Fauces los condenó a la extinción. Tras la muerte de Solomorne, los Arbitrator continuaron con su deber con honor, hasta que, con el tiempo, ellos también fallecieron y la Extensión de Koronus se encontró sin su atenta supervisión.

languages.text: 数年後、ソロモーン・アンサールは将帥に昇進し、すべてのアービトレイターに対する要求を即座に厳格化した。彼らは、思想や行動において一切の非難を受ける余地のない存在であること、そして宗教的と言えるほど禁欲的であることを求められた。偉大なる将帥の指導の下で、アービトレイターたちは皇帝の神聖なる光の真の担い手となった。しかし、マウを越えて新たな人材が補充されなかったことが、彼らを絶滅へと導く運命ともなった。ソロモーンの死後も、アービトレイターたちは名誉ある職務をまっとうし続けたが、やがて一人また一人と命を落とし、コロヌス・エクスパンスから彼らの不眠不休の監視は失われていった。
languages.original_text: Years later, Solomorne Anthar became Marshal and quickly tightened the requirements for all Arbitrators. They were now expected to be beyond any reproach whatsoever in both thought or deed, as well as ascetic to a religious degree. Under their great Marshal's leadership, the Arbites became the true bearers of the Emperor's divine light; however, the lack of new recruits from across the Maw would also doom them to extinction. After Solomorne's death, the Arbitrators continued to do their duty honourably, until they, too, passed away one by one, leaving the Koronus Expanse without their ever-vigilant oversight.

traits.locale_text: 数年後、ソロモーン・アンサールは将帥に昇進し、すべてのアービトレイターに対する要求を即座に厳格化した。彼らは、思想や行動において一切の非難を受ける余地のない存在であること、そして宗教的と言えるほど禁欲的であることを求められた。偉大なる将帥の指導の下で、アービトレイターたちは皇帝の神聖なる光の真の担い手となった。しかし、マウを越えて新たな人材が補充されなかったことが、彼らを絶滅へと導く運命ともなった。ソロモーンの死後も、アービトレイターたちは名誉ある職務をまっとうし続けたが、やがて一人また一人と命を落とし、コロヌス・エクスパンスから彼らの不眠不休の監視は失われていった。

languages.text: Yıllar sonra Solomorne Anthar, Miralay oldu ve tüm Yargıcıların yükümlülüklerini hiç vakit kaybetmeden daha da katı bir hâle getirdi. Artık onlardan hem düşüncelerinde hem de eylemlerinde her türlü kınamanın ötesine geçmeleri ve dinî derecede çileci olmaları bekleniyordu. Büyük Miralay'ın önderliğinde Arbites, İmparator'un ilahi ışığının gerçek taşıyıcıları mertebesine erişti. Ancak Ağız'ın ötesinden yeni acemilerin yoksunluğu, Yargıcıları aynı zamanda yok olmaya da mahkûm edecekti. Solomorne'un ölümünden sonra Yargıcılar görevlerini onurla yapmaya devam etti. Ancak hepsi birer birer hayata gözlerini yumup Koronus Enginliği'ni ihtiyatlı gözetimlerinden mahrum bıraktı.
languages.original_text: Years later, Solomorne Anthar became Marshal and quickly tightened the requirements for all Arbitrators. They were now expected to be beyond any reproach whatsoever in both thought or deed, as well as ascetic to a religious degree. Under their great Marshal's leadership, the Arbites became the true bearers of the Emperor's divine light; however, the lack of new recruits from across the Maw would also doom them to extinction. After Solomorne's death, the Arbitrators continued to do their duty honourably, until they, too, passed away one by one, leaving the Koronus Expanse without their ever-vigilant oversight.

traits.locale_text: Yıllar sonra Solomorne Anthar, Miralay oldu ve tüm Yargıcıların yükümlülüklerini hiç vakit kaybetmeden daha da katı bir hâle getirdi. Artık onlardan hem düşüncelerinde hem de eylemlerinde her türlü kınamanın ötesine geçmeleri ve dinî derecede çileci olmaları bekleniyordu. Büyük Miralaylarının önderliğinde Arbites, İmparator'un ilahi ışığının gerçek taşıyıcıları mertebesine erişti ancak Ağız'ın ötesinden yeni acemilerin yoksunluğu Yargıcıları aynı zamanda yok olmaya da mahkûm edecekti. Solomorne'un ölümünden sonra Yargıcılar görevlerini onurla yapmaya devam ettiler, ta ki onlar da birer birer hayata gözlerini yumup Koronus Enginliği'ni ihtiyatlı gözetimlerinden mahrum bırakana kadar.
